segments.text: They are playing the wedding march , and I have felt tears .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm very touched , and I can't help bursting into tears at the wedding .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? I have seen that our wedding , but just mary's .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mary looks so beautiful in the wedding gown , and I record the moment that I was bride .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are always be the most beautiful one in the world . What is the bridemaid's name ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Judy , Why are you so interested in her ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't be so sensitive , just a casual question , I caught you looking at the groomsman
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wonder why he is chosen to be the groomsman , and why mary doesn't marry him since he's much more attractive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why are you so bitter ? No one tells worse joke than you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Administer is doing a good job . I'm not sure they'll be as happy as we are .
segments.speaker: S1
